boardgame.name: Rum _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Bones
boardgame.description: Avast ye pirates! Gather your crews and set sail for adventure on the high seas in Rum _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp; Bones!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Based on online MOBA (Multiplayer Online Battle Arena) style games, Rum _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp; Bones has 2-6 players taking control of legendary pirate heroes, each with unique powers and abilities, as their crews fight over Davy Jones' legendary treasure!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Players will each control up to five heroes at any time, moving them across the game board in an attempt to destroy various key features across their opponents ship. Victory is obtained by destroying enough of these features. Your heroes are not alone, however, as your crew also consists of deckhands and bosuns who, while not controlled by the player, will work on a simple AI to wreak havoc on the enemy!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Of course, what would pirates be without plunder? And in Rum _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp; Bones the most sought after treasure are Davy Jones' mythical pieces of eight! Players will amass these powerful coins during gameplay to unleash devastating abilities and attacks from their Heroes, crushing all enemies before them until only they remain!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

This is a pre-order for the Captain Pledge Level (Kickstarter Version) of the game Rum _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Bones. Brand New and in shrink. All stretch rewards (additional faction and deck, promo heroes, sea creature pack, etc.) are included. Also comes with the following add-ons : - La Brise Sanguine Expansion + KS exclusive extras - La Brise Sanguine Heroes Set #1 - Mazu_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Dreadful Curse Expansion + KS exclusive extras - Mazu_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Dreadful Curse Heroes Set #1 - Bone Devils Heroes Set #1 - Wellsport Brotherhood Heroes Set #1 - Luck Goddesses This means that every KS exclusives that were made available to buy during the campaign are included in this sale with the only exception of the Skullkickers set. As soon as I receive the game I will ship it to you within 24 hours. Ships to Canada and USA only, with tracking. Payment via Paypal only. Contact me for an estimated shipping quote. Thanks for reading and don_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t hesitate if you have any questions !

Captain Blackbeard, Mister Cuddles - Swashbuckler, Handsome Jack - Quartermaster, Dudley the Duelist - Gunner, Leopold The cleaver of Cordova - Brute) 3) Mercenaries Promo Set # 2 (3 minis, 3 Hero Cards. Captain Hook, Peter Pan - Quartermaster, Ahab the Vengeful - Gunner) 4) Mercenaries Heroes Set # 2 (3 minis, 3 Hero Cards. Bossman Kastel - Gunner, Lord Nelson - Swashbuckler, Don Quixote - Brute) 5) Wellsport Brotherhood mix (3 Minis, 4 Hero Cards. Selvin the Lucky - Swashbuckler, _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Not so Noble_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; Baston Duchampe - Brute, Cochon Bombardier - Gunner) 6) Bone _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Devils Mix (3 minis, 4 Hero Cards. Mister Smith - Gunner, Eric the Dead - Brute, Meirenyu -The Pale Syren - Gunner) 7) Helrokkers (5 Mercenary Heroes, KS Exclusive. 5 Minis, 5 Hero Cards. Captain Napoleon, Thunder Lars - Brute, The Killmaster - Quertermaster, The Slasher - Swashbuckler, Alex of Pain - Gunner) 8) 50 Plastic coin packs 9) Mercenary Tide Card Deck 10) Custom Dice Pack 11) Zip lock with 2 minis (2 sculpted deck Guns, KS Exclusive) Everything is in Excellent condition _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Unopened. Shipping _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Handling: $15.00

Brand new Kickstarter Captain pledge level game. Includes all stretch goals. Does not include any optional buys. Buyer pays exact shipping (up to $30) from 43235. Although shipping could be as low as $8.50 if you are in or near Ohio. This is the Kickstarter _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Captain_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; pledge and everything that comes with the pledge including KS bonuses and exclusives. _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Will also include: The limited edition resin figure of Albrecht the Damned (a Christmas Edition skeleton Santa Claus version) for the game Rum and Bones. There were only 150 of these figures made, and would be a great way to upgrade your character. This is brand new, never opened, straight from CMON, as originally offered for sale to their Kickstarter backers. Their descriptions stated: -Model is Resin; -Model must be attached/glued to base ; -Model does not come with Stat Card. It is only the model; -Limited to 150 available _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt; Also included: Kickstarter exclusive SKULLKICKERS Add on Kickstarter exclusive Luck Goddesses Add on Accept Paypal or IBAN with BIC Any questions just ask.

Rum _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Bones Board Game + 3 Kickstarter Expansions + Mercenary tide deck + Custom Dice *Mint Condition* Get this newly released miniatures game by Cool Mini or Not with expansions and extras to really add in extra variety and flavor to your game. Comes with 3 of the exclusive kickstarter expansions (-1 character), yellow custom dice set and the mercenary tide deck all bagged and ready to ship. Everything is in mint condition or still in packaging (see pics). What you get: Rum _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Bones core game Helrockers expansion Bones Devils mix expansion Wellsport mix expansion (please note the Cochon Bombardier character is not included) Yellow custom dice Mercenary tide deck Info: All of the expansions and extras will be packaged in the core game box (see pic) I will dispatch the game within 1-2 working days. I will package the game in box/water proof parcel P_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;P £6.95, sent via a tracked + signed _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; covered delivery service From a smoke _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; pet free home P.S. Rum _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Bones Base game + all Kickstarter exclusive stretch goals brand new and sealed What_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s included: RUM _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; BONES CORE GAME --KS Exclusive stretch goals-- MERCENARY HEROES SET #2 HELRÖKKERS MERCENARIES PROMOS SET #1 MERCENARIES PROMOS SET #2 WELLSPORT BROTHERHOOD MIX BONE DEVILS MIX SEA CREATURES PACK DECK GUNS MERCENARY TIDE DECK PLASTIC COINS CUSTOM DICE
Other info: I will dispatch the game within 1-2 working days. I will package the game in box/water proof parcel UK P_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;P £12.50 sent via a tracked + signed delivery service From a smoke _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; pet free home Game description: Avast ye pirates! Gather your crews and set sail for adventure on the high seas in Rum _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Bones! Based on online MOBA (Multiplayer Online Battle Arena) style games, Rum _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Bones has 2-6 players taking control of legendary pirate heroes, each with unique powers and abilities, as their crews fight over Davy Jones_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039; legendary treasure! Players will each control up to five heroes at any time, moving them across the game board in an attempt to destroy various key features across their opponents ship. Victory is obtained by destroying enough of these features. Your heroes are not alone, however, as your crew also consists of deckhands and bosuns who, while not controlled by the player, will work on a simple AI to wreak havoc on the enemy! Of course, what would pirates be without plunder? And in Rum _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Bones the most sought after treasure are Davy Jones_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039; mythical pieces of eight! Players will amass these powerful coins during gameplay to unleash devastating abilities and attacks from their Heroes, crushing all enemies before them until only they remain! P.S. I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m having a games CLEAROUT!!! Check out my other games (I will combine shipping where possible).

Reserved for user beowulf This is the first season of Rum and Bones by Cool Mini or not, KS version. With this purchase you will receive: 1) Rum and Bones base game 2) All ks exclusive figures and cards that came with the base pledge 3) all non exclusive characters that came with the base pledge 4) the sea dragon minature (please confim) (unopened) 5) mercenary tide deck 6) kraken minature unopened ( please confirm) 7) 50 plastic coins, 6 pirate custom dice. 8) 4 sculpted deck guns 9) mazus dreadful curse expansion with captain Nemo exclusive figure (game combined with base game) 10) la bride sanguine expansion with exclusive figure (game combined with base game) 11) the luck goddesses ks exclusive set 12) the skull kickers ks exclusive set Please note of how I have my game and the condition it is in. I have played 3 times and loved it. However, I can not justify keeping it my collection with the lack of plays that it gets. I simply am trying to reduce my collection. The reason it is not in excellent condition is that you will not be receive all of the boxes that the products came in. I tried to efficiently store all of my miniatures. Thus, I placed each faction in its own box by using the expansion boxes. Everything is in near perfect condition but I combine all of my stuff for efficency. All of the mercinaries are also stored separately in their own box to find easily with their own tide deck. Buyer pays shipping, but I will go to lengths to make sure that the product is not damaged in the shipping process. If you have any questions, do not hesitate to send me a message.
